taskDescription: Ask your students to search Opus (https://opus.nlpl.eu/) for a corpus in the domain and language combination that best suits your translation course or interests. Then, ask them to train an NMT engine on MutNMT with it. Next, ask them to use this engine to get the translation of a text already known by them and ask them to discuss per pairs kind of pre-editings would have improved the raw MT output.
